Name: Abydos Facula
Namesake: Egyptian town where Osiris was worshipped.

Name: Akhmin Facula
Namesake: Egyptian town where Min was worshipped.

Name: Bigeh Facula
Namesake: Island where Hapi, Egyptian Nile god, resided.

Name: Buto Facula
Namesake: Swamp where Isis hid Osiris' body.

Name: Coptos Facula
Namesake: Early town from which caravans departed.

Name: Edfu Facula
Namesake: Egyptian town where Horus was worshipped.

Name: Heliopolis Facula
Namesake: Sacred Egyptian city of the sun.

Name: Sais Facula
Namesake: Capital of Egypt in mid-7th century B.C.

Name: Siwah Facula
Namesake: Oasis oracle of Zeus-Ammon; visited by Alexander.
